item.description:
Meatout Day 2010 on March 20th, the Spring Equinox

Every year, there is a meatout day where people are asked to refrain from eating animals, eggs and dairy. This day is held on the spring equinox (the first day of spring). Please RSVP Yes if you intend to participate by not eating animals on this day.

Meatout 2010 is culminating with great success!
A thousand outreach activities are taking place throughout all 50 U.S. states and a record 31 other countries! Vegan educational events include colorful festivals, lectures, public dinners, feed-ins, cooking demonstrations, food samples, leafleting, information tables, and more.

The 30-second Meatout TV ad
www.youtube.com/watch?v=jmjl8bWg06s

The primary organizer of this event is Alex Hershaft's FARM (Farm Animal Rights Movement, formerly Farm Animal Reform Movement), which is a wonderful organization and one that is safe to which to make donations.

To donate, please visit:
www.givedirect.org/give/givefrm.asp?Action=GC&CID=483

To learn more about FARM, please visit:
www.FARMUSA.org

To learn more about eating vegan, especially raw vegan, please read through our own files:
www.meetup.com/RawBoston/files
item.name: Meatout Day 2010 on March 20th, the Spring Equinox
